subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: As a youngster, Robert Doornbos dreamed of being the Netherlands’ next tennis star, of hitting backhand winners and overhead smashes on Center Court at Wimbledon the way his countryman Richard Krajicek once did.
snippet: As a youngster, Robert Doornbos dreamed of being the Netherlands’ next tennis star, of hitting backhand winners and overhead smashes on Center Court at Wimbledon the way his countryman Richard Krajicek once did.
